DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate emotional functional benefit Poly-L-Lactic Acid ( Sculptra™ ) , cosmetic product use fill defect skin . All participant receive Sculptra™ .
DOC.brief_title: The Emotional Functional Benefits Poly-L-Lactic Acid
DOC.detailed_description: Facial volume loss result emotional distress functional impairment affect individual . Poly-L-Lactic Acid ( Sculptra™ ) stimulate collagen production skin thereby replenish collagen lose natural age ultraviolet damage . This study assess emotional functional benefit Poly-L-Lactic Acid treat subject 's self report measurement tool .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject must outpatient , male female subject race , 35 year age old . 2 . Subject must degree facial volume loss . 3 . Subjects Fitzpatrick skin type eligible . 4 . Subject must able follow study instruction likely complete require visit , assess Investigator . 5 . Subject must sign IRBapproved Informed Consent form , Photographic Release Form , Authorization Use release Health Research Study Information ( HIPAA ) form prior studyrelated procedure perform . 1 . Any previous facial treatment : c. Any facial filler past 2 year d. Prior injection permanent facial implant 2 . Have skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation face . 3 . Be unable communicate cooperate Investigator due language barrier ( nonEnglish speaking ) , poor mental development , impaired cerebral function . 4 . Have evidence alcohol drug abuse ( Investigator opinion ) , history poor cooperation , noncompliance medical treatment , unreliability . 5 . Have use investigational device , biologic drug past 30 day , currently participate experimental drug , biologic device trial . 6 . Have condition situation , Investigator 's opinion , may put subject significant risk , may confound study result , may interfere significantly subject 's participation study . 7 .
